elements.title: Rearrange the sentences so that the important information is at the beginning of the sentence and is thus emphasized.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Unfortunately we have not yet received your order.
elements.correctAnswer: Unfortunately, we have not yet received your order.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: The date had to be postponed for the third time.
elements.correctAnswer: The date had to be postponed for the third time.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: His move to the rival company would come as no surprise to anyone.
elements.correctAnswer: No one would be surprised by his move to the rival company.

elements.title: The basis for a successful career is solid vocational training.

elements.correctAnswer: We almost forgot to invite the seven retirees as well.
